title: League of Legends Circuit Oceania
content: The League of Legends Circuit Oceania (LCO) is the top-level of professional League of Legends competition in Oceania,[a] founded in 2021 and hosted by ESL Australia and Guinevere Capital. The LCO replaced the Oceanic Pro League (OPL), hosted by Riot Games Oceania from 2015 to 2020.[1][2][3] The annual season consists of two splits, each of which conclude in a double-elimination tournament between the top five teams.
